name: places/ChIJ_____4pYwokRg7FBRNixZdg
formattedAddress: 750 Columbus Ave PHJ, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 750 Columbus Ave PHJ, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
Julie was our designer when we did a complete remodel of our NYC studio.
While not our primary residence, we still wanted it to feel like a home and not a place you drop your luggage.
We got all that and more working with Julie. She was able to take my ideas, long- distance, and translate them into exactly what I wanted.  Couldn’t be happier!
The whole process went smoothly and we were able to walk into a finished apartment, without any of the work involved to get there.
She takes pride in her work and it shows.

originalText.text:
Having completed a recent renovation in Colorado, I had high expectations of a designer here in NYC. I sought a recommendation from my former design/construction crew who recommended Julie, telling me that beyond the expected design skills she had completed their seminar on aging in place. I was excited that she also specialized in the use of color and feng shui.

My project went beyond the exciting process of renovation. Unexpectedly widowed I relocated from Colorado, downsizing and adjusting to urban life. Rather than building a dream home (I’d done that), I now needed to edit my furnishings and incorporate many of the comforts I had just become accustomed to, where possible. This also had to be done during Covid19 and supply chain restrictions, not to mention the transition from sprawling home to NYC apartment.

Julie exceeded my expectations. She is a true problem solver, and helped me to negotiate some tendentious situations. She was always positive, grounded, and on top of any and all required changes. Her contacts and network speak well of her well-earned reputation. She graciously accepted my preferences and gently guided me from certain mistakes. Her recommended contractor was efficient and reliable. I’m proud to say my modest apartment is a showcase and beyond that, functions well for my everyday life. Thank you Julie.

originalText.text: This is the first time I have worked with Julie.  She came highly recommended by a friend so I called her.  I had a very challenging job for her which was to furnish three rooms in just eight weeks and Julie delivered!  She found great furniture that was in stock, so no waiting 20 or 24 weeks for delivery. Julie is a great designer and I would definitely hire her again.

originalText.text: Julie is a true pro and has a wonderful design esthetic. Easy to work with, good communicator and someone you can count on to do a fantastic job.  I have had the pleasure working with Julie on a few different projects and am always impressed!

text.text: Julie is a true pro and has a wonderful design esthetic. Easy to work with, good communicator and someone you can count on to do a fantastic job.  I have had the pleasure working with Julie on a few different projects and am always impressed!

originalText.text: I have had the wonderful pleasure of knowing and working with Julie over the past 4+ years. As a photographer with an interior design background I so appreciate her sense of style, eye for detail, feng sui knowledge and professionalism. Julie is always upbeat, positive and you feel like you are in good hands.
